      • checkForMaliciousInput

        public static String checkForMaliciousInput(String input)
        Checks given string for malicious input (SQL injections, HTML injections, <script> injections.
        Parameters:
        input - input string to be validated
        Returns:
        empty string if validation successful, string with message error if forbidden characters detected

      • setIfEmpty

        private String setIfEmpty(String givenString,
                          String givenResult)

        private void throwError(Errors errors,
                        String property,
                        String message)

      • convertErrorsToHashMap

        public static Map<String,String> convertErrorsToHashMap(BindingResult bindingResult)
        Converts errors from BindingResult to map. For every error code a special prefix "error_" is added. For example: "name:too short" is converted to "error_name:too short". Used for view part of application, to show different validation errors.
        Parameters:
        bindingResult - object containing validation errors for conversion.
        Returns:
        Map<String, String> of converted errors.
